channel.title: Basic client editing
channel.description:
Ok, well I know jack shit about client editing.
But yeah, I just wanna change some basic things on a client - not to release and take 100% credit for, but for my server when I release it for the public to play on.
I pretty much just wanna change the backround and some names... lol
Could someone please explain it for me, or give me a link to a tutorial.

item.title: Basic client editing
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

[quote=“Nickisazombe, post:2, topic:180146”]1. to change the text in the top left corner of client you’d go to “frame_sub1” or whatever and the name should be right around top.
2. Go to client.java and search the original clients name and the person who made it, then just replace and compile

uh the backround i forget how to do :s

~Nickisazombe xD[/quote]

that is the wrong way to do it

download this client

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

and use my tut to pimp it up (lol)

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Basic client editing
item.dc:creator: @Nickisazombe Nickisazombe
item.description:
@Nickisazombe wrote:

  1. to change the text in the top left corner of client you’d go to “frame_sub1” or whatever and the name should be right around top.
  2. Go to client.java and search the original clients name and the person who made it, then just replace and compile

uh the backround i forget how to do :s

~Nickisazombe xD

Read full topic
